name: Laughing In The Face Of The Lion - Girl's V-Neck Tee
description:
Each girl's tee is a unique work of art, designed by Daria, hand screen-printed to create the ultimate high-quality product inspired by Daria's courageous mantra and new album.

NOTE! SIZES RUN QUITE SMALL! If you're usually a small, a medium will fit tightly, a large will be an effortlessly perfect fit. ;-)

Features the "Laughing In The Face Of The Lion" phrase + Daria / Lion logo on the front, with "Daria Musk" on the back.

Tees are made from a gorgeous tri-blend heathered cotton-poly fabric that feels crazy-soft and stands up to tons of washing. Super-flattering fit with feminine cap sleeves.

options.name: LARGE - AMETHYST HEATHER (Perfect fit for regular small & medium sizes)
LARGE - EMERALD HEATHER (Perfect fit for regular small & medium sizes)
LARGE - NAVY HEATHER (Perfect fit for regular small & medium sizes)
XL - AMETHYST HEATHER (Perfect fit for regular large)
XL - NAVY HEATHER (Perfect fit for regular large)
SMALL - CHARCOAL HEATHER (CREW NECK, NOT V-NECK!)

name: Laughing In The Face Of The Lion - Guy's Tee
description:
Each guy's tee is a unique work of art, designed by Daria Musk, hand screen-printed to create the ultimate high-quality product inspired by Daria's new album.

NOTE! Size run are fashion-fit are run a bit small. For a more relaxed fit order one size up from your normal choice. :-)

Features the "Laughing In The Face Of The Lion" phrase on the front and the Daria / Lion logo on the back. 

Tees are made of the super soft 50%/50% cotton-poly blend of heathered fabric that feels amazing and stands up to tons of washing. Classy cool fit.

name: Laughing In The Face Of The Lion - Girl's Racerback Tank
description:
Each racerback tank is a unique work of art, designed by Daria Musk, hand screen-printed to create the ultimate high-quality product inspired by Daria's new album. 

Features the "Laughing In The Face Of The Lion" phrase and the Daria / Lion logo on the front, with "Daria Musk" on the back. 

Tanks are made from a gorgeous tri-blend heathered cotton-poly fabric that feels amazing and stands up to tons of washing. Super flattering fit.

name: ALL ACCESS VIP DOWNLOAD CARD
description:
This little glossy plastic card packs a huge punch! 
With over 20 songs, photos, lyrics, art and video encoded into it's unique download passcode, it's the total fan experience in it's most eco-friendly, collectable, super cool form. 

Each download card also comes with attached lanyard to make it wearable like a VIP Pass, turn it into a hipper keychain than the one lost in your bag or to rock your rearview mirror. ;-)
